title: Comprehensive audit reports missing standard structure
why_it_matters: Without standard structure, these reports are hard to maintain and may drift out of sync with documentation standards. Missing Version History and Purpose sections violate Tier 2 requirements.
suggested_fix: Add standard Tier 2 headers to each report: Purpose section, Last Updated date in metadata, Version History table, AI Instructions section.
acceptance_tests: All 4 audit reports pass docs:check validation
Each report has Version History table
Each report has Purpose/Overview section
Each report has Last Updated date

evidence_collected: See files array for affected locations

title: Broken link to FALSE_POSITIVES.jsonl
why_it_matters: Broken links confuse readers and indicate outdated documentation. This file is referenced in agent policy but does not exist.
suggested_fix: Either create docs/audits/FALSE_POSITIVES.jsonl or update the reference in SKILL_AGENT_POLICY.md to point to the correct location or remove the reference.
acceptance_tests: docs:check reports no broken link at line 312
Referenced file exists OR link is removed

evidence_collected: See files array for affected locations

title: Missing CONTRIBUTING.md at root level
why_it_matters: Standard open-source convention. Helps onboard contributors with guidelines for code style, PR process, and development workflow. README.md references contribution guidelines.
suggested_fix: Create CONTRIBUTING.md with sections: Getting Started, Development Setup, Code Style, Pull Request Process, Code Review, Testing Requirements.
acceptance_tests: CONTRIBUTING.md exists at root level
File includes development setup instructions
File includes PR process documentation
README.md links to CONTRIBUTING.md work

evidence_collected: See files array for affected locations

title: Inconsistent test metrics between README and DEVELOPMENT
why_it_matters: Developers may not know the actual test status. README.md says 89/91 (97.8%) while DEVELOPMENT.md says 115/116 (99.1%). Undermines trust in documentation.
suggested_fix: Update README.md to match DEVELOPMENT.md test count: 115/116 tests passing (99.1%)
acceptance_tests: README.md shows 115/116 tests (or current accurate count)
Test counts match between README.md and DEVELOPMENT.md

title: Types file lacks JSDoc documentation
why_it_matters: Types are the API contract for journal entries. Exported interfaces like JournalEntry, MoodEntry, GratitudeEntry have no documentation explaining field purposes or constraints.
suggested_fix: Add JSDoc comments to all exported interfaces and types explaining purpose, field meanings, and usage examples.
acceptance_tests: Each exported interface has JSDoc comment
Each interface field has @description or inline comment
Types file has module-level documentation

title: Template placeholder dates fail validation
why_it_matters: Templates have literal YYYY-MM-DD which fails docs:check validation. Creates false positives in automated checks.
suggested_fix: Replace literal YYYY-MM-DD with [DATE] placeholder or actual template creation date.
acceptance_tests: No templates have literal YYYY-MM-DD in Last Updated field
docs:check no longer reports invalid date format for templates

title: Process audit directory missing required sections
why_it_matters: Multiple files missing Purpose, Version History, Last Updated sections per tier requirements. Inconsistent documentation structure.
suggested_fix: Add required headers to each file: Purpose section, Last Updated date, Version History table. Consider consolidating into fewer well-structured reports.
acceptance_tests: All files in directory pass docs:check
Each file has Purpose section
Each file has Version History table

title: Missing Cloud Functions API reference
why_it_matters: 15+ Cloud Functions are exported but no dedicated API reference exists. Developers need to know available endpoints, parameters, rate limits, and security requirements.
suggested_fix: Create docs/CLOUD_FUNCTIONS_API.md documenting each callable function with parameters, return values, rate limits, and error codes.
acceptance_tests: CLOUD_FUNCTIONS_API.md exists in docs/
All exported Cloud Functions are documented
Each function has parameter and return type documentation
Rate limits documented for each function

title: lib/constants.ts missing module documentation
why_it_matters: Constants define magic numbers, query limits, and configuration. No module-level or constant-level documentation explains their purpose or safe values.
suggested_fix: Add JSDoc module comment and document key exported constants with their purpose and constraints.
acceptance_tests: lib/constants.ts has module-level JSDoc
QUERY_LIMITS has documentation explaining each limit
buildPath functions have JSDoc comments

title: DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md date format error
why_it_matters: Metadata line has malformed date with trailing pipe character, failing docs:check validation.
suggested_fix: Fix the Last Updated date format in the metadata header, removing trailing | character.
acceptance_tests: DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md passes docs:check
Date format is valid YYYY-MM-DD

title: Malformed link in audit-refactoring-report.md
why_it_matters: Broken link in code example causes docs:check to fail. Link text appears to be part of code, not an actual link.
suggested_fix: Review line 520 and fix the malformed Markdown link syntax in the code example.
acceptance_tests: docs:check reports no broken link at line 520
Code example is properly formatted

title: ERROR_HANDLING_AUDIT_SUMMARY.md invalid date format
why_it_matters: Last Updated field contains invalid date format: 'but views stale' instead of proper date.
suggested_fix: Fix the Last Updated field to contain a valid YYYY-MM-DD date.
acceptance_tests: File passes docs:check validation
Last Updated is valid date format

title: Missing Quick Start sections in templates
why_it_matters: Templates missing recommended Quick Start section per Tier 2 documentation standards.
suggested_fix: Add Quick Start section to each template showing basic usage pattern.
acceptance_tests: Each template has Quick Start section
Quick Start provides clear usage instructions

title: Missing AI Instructions sections in various docs
why_it_matters: AI Instructions sections help AI assistants understand how to use and update documents correctly. Missing in several files.
suggested_fix: Add AI Instructions section to each file explaining how AI should use and maintain the document.
acceptance_tests: Each file has AI Instructions section
Instructions are relevant to document type

title: Orphaned document needs linking or archiving
why_it_matters: Standalone document with no inbound links from index or navigation. Appears to be historical technical ideation document.
suggested_fix: Either add to DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md under appropriate section, or archive to docs/archive/ with proper archive note.
acceptance_tests: Document is either linked from index OR archived
If archived, has archive note at top

title: audit-2026-01-17 reports missing recommended sections
why_it_matters: January 17 audit reports missing recommended AI Instructions and Quick Start sections.
suggested_fix: Add AI Instructions section to each explaining how to use and reference the audit findings.
acceptance_tests: Each file has AI Instructions section

title: decisions/TEMPLATE.md has invalid date placeholder
why_it_matters: Template has '** YYYY-MM-DD' with extra asterisks causing invalid date format warning.
suggested_fix: Fix date format to remove extra asterisks, use [DATE] placeholder.
acceptance_tests: File passes docs:check validation

title: LEARNING_METRICS.md missing Quick Start
why_it_matters: Document missing recommended Quick Start section for Tier 2 documentation.
suggested_fix: Add Quick Start section explaining how to view and interpret learning metrics.
acceptance_tests: File has Quick Start section

title: TESTING_INFRASTRUCTURE_PLAN.md invalid date format
why_it_matters: Last Updated field contains description text instead of date: 'when UI intentionally changes'.
suggested_fix: Fix Last Updated to contain valid YYYY-MM-DD date.
acceptance_tests: File passes docs:check validation

title: PLAN_MAP.md date format error
why_it_matters: Metadata has malformed date: '2026-02-02 | **Version:** 1.8' combining date with version.
suggested_fix: Split date and version into separate metadata lines.
acceptance_tests: File passes docs:check validation
Date and Version are separate fields

title: CANON_QUICK_REFERENCE.md missing Quick Start
why_it_matters: Quick reference document missing Quick Start section for Tier 2 documentation.
suggested_fix: Add Quick Start section at top of document.
acceptance_tests: File has Quick Start section

title: JSONL_SCHEMA_STANDARD.md missing Quick Start
why_it_matters: Schema standard document missing Quick Start section for Tier 2 documentation.
suggested_fix: Add Quick Start section showing basic JSONL schema usage.
acceptance_tests: File has Quick Start section

title: ROADMAP_LOG.md missing acceptance criteria section
why_it_matters: Tier 3 planning document missing recommended acceptance criteria section.
suggested_fix: Add acceptance criteria section or review if section is appropriate for log-type document.
acceptance_tests: File passes docs:check OR has documented exception

title: Limited Tier 5 (Guides) documentation
why_it_matters: Only 2 Tier 5 guide documents exist. Users and developers would benefit from more how-to guides and tutorials.
suggested_fix: Identify common workflows and create step-by-step guides: Getting Started, First Contribution, Deploying Changes, Running Audits.
acceptance_tests: At least 4 Tier 5 guides exist
Guides cover common developer workflows
